page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: My brother and I get up at 7a.m. during the week but later at the weekend. We get our own cereal or Mum makes toast or bacon. Then I take the dog for a walk,do piano practice or clean our shoes. In the week we have lunch at school.At weekends Mum cooks. We have roast beef with Yorkshire pudding and sometimes "picnic" lunches (cold meat,salad and cheese). Mum tries not to give us too much red meat or fat these days. We have a lady to clean the house twice a week because Mum teaches part-time.Dad works in Cheltenham and gets home at seven.Mum shops in Campden for vegetables but other goods are too expensive.We have a dog called Humphrey who is great company. He gives us plenty to do like closing the door after him or bathing him when he has rolled in something. The family like hiking and travel.
